title: 2.x: Check runnable == null in *Scheduler.schedule*().
body: To enforce `@NotNull` guarantee for the PR #5734, see  https://github.com/ReactiveX/RxJava/pull/5734/files#r153951238

title: 2.x: RxJavaPlugins unwrapRunnable
body:
